title: Scaffolding-Based Education for Strengthening Technical Communication Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environments utilizing learners’ personal devices, with practical competency enhancement through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can structure and write technical documents across various scientific fields according to their intended purposes.
Learners can perform a document revision process incorporating peer feedback using digital collaboration tools.
Learners can simplify and convey complex technical information to suit the target audience.

resources: Online Collaboration Platforms (Google Workspace, Notion, etc.)
Technical documentation samples for science disciplines

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
